name: Magra Vikas Sansthan Ovara
briefDescription: Magra Vikas Sansthan alias M.V.S. is a non-government, non-profit, registered voluntary organization which is working for last one and a half decade in Tribal regions and has taken up several programmes for the development of rural poor, small & marginal farmers. Scheduled Caste and Scheduled Tribe, Backward class and other weaker section of the community in the state of Rajasthan in India. This organization was established in the year 1992. Since its inception, the organization is providing services in development sector for Health, Education, Livestock, eco-development and proper management of natural resources, Water management, Improving agriculture practices, Promoting Organic produces and other NRM activities. We implement the entire programme by involving Community towards their Cultural, Economic and Social development.
